column2: Please rate your agreement with the following statement: "I regularly update or add new content and materials to my courses throughout the semester."
column3: Approximately how many peer-reviewed publications (e.g., journal articles, book chapters) have you authored or co-authored in the past 3 years? (Numeric)
column4: Approximately how many new grant proposals have you submitted (as a PI or Co-PI) in the past 3 years? (Numeric)
column5: Please rate your agreement with the following statement: "I feel I have adequate time and resources to focus on my research agenda.
column6: How many major institutional or departmental committees do you currently serve on?
column7: Please rate your agreement with the following statement: "My level of service work feels manageable and is valued by my institution."
column8: Please rate your agreement with the following statement: "I feel a strong sense of connection and belonging within my department/unit."
column9: Competence: "I feel effective and competent in my core academic responsibilities
column10: Autonomy: "I feel a strong sense of autonomy and control over my work."
column11: Relatedness: "I feel genuinely connected to and cared for by my colleagues and the institution."
